Name: Pallini
Description: The capital of East Attica, a town surrounded by green landscapes and close to the coast.

Name: Paiania
Description: A municipality in East Attica, known for its vineyards, suburban character, and cultural sites.

Name: Markopoulo
Description: A town known for its proximity to the Eleftherios Venizelos Airport and its agricultural landscape.

Name: Rafina-Pikermi
Description: A coastal municipality, famous for its beautiful beaches and small-town charm.

Name: Spata-Artemida
Description: A region that includes Spata, known for its proximity to Athens International Airport, and the coastal area of Artemida.

Name: Kalyvia
Description: A town with a rural setting, popular for its outdoor spaces and proximity to the town of Markopoulo.

Name: Lavreotiki
Description: A coastal municipality known for the ancient Temple of Poseidon and its beautiful beaches.

Name: Gerakas
Description: A suburban area with a mix of residential zones, shopping centers, and green spaces.
